name: Companionship
description: Our traveler has ventured far into the galaxy and finds himself just outside the Cygnus constellation. Trekking the multiple Kepler exoearths, searching for any signs of extraterrestrials. Walking through a caravan, he heard a faint beeping in the distance. He arms himself and is ready to engage the unknown threat. Upon locating the mysterious beeping, our traveler stumbles onto a spacecraft wreck. He goes in deeper to investigate. The beepings source comes from a damaged assistance drone. After assessing the little guy, his memory has been wiped and he's been stripped of valuable parts. The traveler decides to make a few repairs to the best of his capabilities. Although not perfect, the drone is functional once more. Out of gratitude, the drone offers to join our traveler on his journey to find the unknown. The traveler has made a new companion. He's given him the name, Keplar, in homage to the beginning of their origin.
